00056   void
00057   processOptions(const TMS_Data::ListJobsOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest) {
00058 
00059     //To check if the jobId is defined
00060     if (options->getJobId().size() != 0) {
00061       //To check if the jobIf exists
00062       checkJobId(options->getJobId());
00063       //To add the jobId on the request
00064       addOptionRequest("jobId", options->getJobId(), sqlRequest);
00065     }
00066 
00067     //To check if the number of cpu is defined and positive
00068     if (options->getNbCpu() > 0) {
00069       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00070       addOptionRequest("nbCpus", convertToString(options->getNbCpu()), sqlRequest);
00071     } else {
00072       //If the options is not the default value -1
00073       if (options->getNbCpu() != -1) {
00074         throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, "The number of cpu is incorrect");
00075       }
00076     }
00077 
00078     time_t fromSubmitDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getFromSubmitDate());
00079     if(fromSubmitDate != -1) {
00080       fromSubmitDate = convertUTCtimeINLocaltime(fromSubmitDate);
00081       std::string submitDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(boost::posix_time::from_time_t(fromSubmitDate));
00082       addTimeRequest("submitDate", submitDateStr, sqlRequest, ">=");
00083     }
00084 
00085     time_t toSubmitDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getToSubmitDate());
00086     if(toSubmitDate != -1) {
00087       toSubmitDate = convertUTCtimeINLocaltime(toSubmitDate); 
00088       std::string submitDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(boost::posix_time::from_time_t(toSubmitDate));
00089       addTimeRequest("submitDate", submitDateStr, sqlRequest, "<=");
00090     }
00091 
00092     //To check the job status
00093     if (options->getStatus() != -1) {
00094       //To check the job status options
00095       checkJobStatus(options->getStatus());
00096       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00097       addOptionRequest("status", convertToString(options->getStatus()), sqlRequest);
00098     } else {
00099        if (options->getJobId().size() == 0) { 
00100          sqlRequest.append(" and status < 5 "); 
00101        } else {
00102          sqlRequest.append(" and status < 6 ");
00103        }
00104     }
00105 
00106     //To check the job priority
00107     if (options->getPriority() != -1) {
00108       //To check the job priority options
00109       checkJobPriority(options->getPriority());
00110       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00111       addOptionRequest("jobPrio", convertToString(options->getPriority()), sqlRequest);
00112     }
00113 
00114     if (options->getOwner().size() != 0) {
00115       addOptionRequest("owner", options->getOwner(), sqlRequest);
00116     }
00117 
00118     //To check if the queue is defined
00119     if (options->getQueue().size() != 0) {
00120       //To check if the queue exists
00121       checkQueueName(options->getQueue());
00122       //To add the jobId on the request
00123       addOptionRequest("jobQueue", options->getQueue(), sqlRequest);
00124     }
00125   }

00132   TMS_Data::ListJobs*
00133   list() {
00134     std::string sqlListOfJobs = "SELECT vsessionid, submitMachineId, submitMachineName, jobId, jobName, jobPath, errorPath,"
00135                                 "outputPath, jobPrio, nbCpus, jobWorkingDir, status, submitDate, endDate, owner,"
00136                                 "jobQueue,wallClockLimit, groupName, jobDescription, memLimit, nbNodes, "
00137                                 "nbNodesAndCpuPerNode from job, vsession "
00138                                 "where vsession.numsessionid=job.vsession_numsessionid"
00139                                 " and status > 0 and job.submitMachineId='"+mmachineId+"'";
00140 
00141     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00142     std::vector<std::string> results;
00143 
00144     TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00145     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListJobs();
00146 
00147     msessionServer.check();
00148 
00149     processOptions(mparameters, sqlListOfJobs);
00150     sqlListOfJobs.append(" order by submitDate");
00151 
00152     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> ListOfJobs (mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListOfJobs.c_str()));
00153     long nbRunningJobs = 0;
00154     long nbWaitingJobs = 0;
00155     int jobStatus ;
00156     time_t submitDate;
00157     time_t endDate;
00158     if (ListOfJobs->getNbTuples() != 0){
00159       for (size_t i = 0; i < ListOfJobs->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00160         results.clear();
00161         results = ListOfJobs->get(i);
00162         ii = results.begin();
00163 
00164         TMS_Data::Job_ptr job = ecoreFactory->createJob();
00165 
00166         job->setSessionId(*ii);
00167         job->setSubmitMachineId(*(++ii));
00168         job->setSubmitMachineName(*(++ii));
00169         job->setJobId(*(++ii));
00170         job->setJobName(*(++ii));
00171         job->setJobPath(*(++ii));
00172         job->setOutputPath(*(++ii));
00173         job->setErrorPath(*(++ii));
00174         job->setJobPrio(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00175         job->setNbCpus(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00176         job->setJobWorkingDir(*(++ii));
00177         jobStatus = convertToInt(*(++ii));
00178         if(jobStatus==4) {
00179           nbRunningJobs++;
00180         } else if(jobStatus >= 1 && jobStatus <= 3) {
00181           nbWaitingJobs++;
00182         }
00183         job->setStatus(jobStatus);
00184         //convert the endDate into UTC date
00185         submitDate = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00186         job->setSubmitDate(submitDate);
00187         //convert the endDate into UTC date
00188         endDate = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00189         job->setEndDate(endDate);
00190         job->setOwner(*(++ii));
00191         job->setJobQueue(*(++ii));
00192         job->setWallClockLimit(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00193         job->setGroupName(*(++ii));
00194         job->setJobDescription(*(++ii));
00195         job->setMemLimit(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00196         job->setNbNodes(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00197         job->setNbNodesAndCpuPerNode(*(++ii)); 
00198 
00199         mlistObject->getJobs().push_back(job);
00200       }
00201       mlistObject->setNbJobs(mlistObject->getJobs().size());
00202       mlistObject->setNbRunningJobs(nbRunningJobs);
00203       mlistObject->setNbWaitingJobs(nbWaitingJobs);
00204     } else {
00205 
00206     }
00207     return mlistObject;
00208   }
